liberal.description: The bill bans most abortions after 15 weeks, with no exceptions for rape or incest.

conservative.title: No, Trump-Administration Policies Won’t Increase the Abortion Rate
conservative.description: Last month, two analysts from the think tank Third Way published an opinion piece in U.S. News and World Report claiming that new Trump-administration policies would cause a surge in the abortion rate. They also credited Obama-administration policies with red…

liberal.title: Trump Tells Anti-Abortion Marchers ‘We Are With You All the Way’ and Shows It
liberal.description: For someone who once described himself as “very pro-choice,” Mr. Trump’s transformation into a champion of the anti-abortion cause is a remarkable political evolution.

conservative.title: New Trump Administration Rule to Cut Planned Parenthood Funding
conservative.description: The Trump administration will announce a new rule that will prohibit abortion providers, as well as abortion referrers, from accessing Title X family-planning funds.

liberal.author: SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
liberal.title: Democrats Zero In on Kavanaugh’s Defense of Presidential Power
liberal.description: Democrats thought the weakness of a Supreme Court nominee would be health care and abortion. Then came Brett M. Kavanaugh’s writings on shielding presidents from investigation.

liberal.title: House Republican Trent Franks Plans to Resign
liberal.description: Mr. Franks, who made his name with strident social conservatism and adamant opposition to abortion in all forms, would be the third lawmaker to step down from office this week.
